content.question: A machine is used to fill bags with a popular brand of trail mix. The machine is calibrated so the distribution of the weights of the bags of trail mix is normal, with mean 240 grams and standard deviation 3 grams. Of the following, which is the least weight of a bag in the top 5 percent of the distribution?

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine relative frequencies, proportions, or probabilities using simulation or calculations.
